testcase.purpose: Check if the Navigator.getBattery exists and return BatteryManager object
Check if the BatteryManager.charging attribute exists, readonly and typeof boolean
Check if the BatteryManager.chargingTime attribute exists, readonly and typeof number
Check if the BatteryManager.dischargingTime attribute exists, readonly and typeof number
Check if the BatteryManager.level attribute exists, readonly and typeof number
Check if the BatteryManager.onchargingchange attribute exists and typeof object
Check if the BatteryManager.onchargingtimechange attribute exists and typeof object
Check if the BatteryManager.ondischargingtimechange attribute exists and typeof object
Check if the BatteryManager.onlevelchange attribute exists and typeof object
Check if the BatteryManager.charging attribute must be set to true when the battery is charging

description.pre_condition: 1. The device is plugged in to the charger before this test is run. 2. The battery must neither be empty or full, nor reach empty or full capacity during the test.

testcase.purpose: Check if the BatteryManager.dischargingTime attribute must be set to the value positive Infinity when the battery is charging

description.pre_condition: 1. The device is plugged in to the charger before this test is run. 2. The battery must neither be empty or full, nor reach empty or full capacity during the test.

testcase.purpose: Check if the BatteryManager.level attribute must be set to the current battery level scaled from 0 to 1.0 when the battery is charging

description.pre_condition: 1. The device is plugged in to the charger before this test is run. 2. The battery must neither be empty or full, nor reach empty or full capacity during the test.

testcase.purpose: Check if the BatteryManager.charging attribute must be set to false when the battery is discharging

description.pre_condition: 1. The device is unplugged from the charger before this test is run. 2. The battery must neither be empty or full, nor reach empty or full capacity during the test.

testcase.purpose: Check if the BatteryManager.chargingTime attribute must be set to the value positive Infinity when the battery is discharging

description.pre_condition: 1. The device is unplugged from the charger before this test is run. 2. The battery must neither be empty or full, nor reach empty or full capacity during the test.

testcase.purpose: Check if the BatteryManager.level attribute must be set to the current battery level scaled from 0 to 1.0 when the battery is discharging

description.pre_condition: 1. The device is unplugged from the charger before this test is run. 2. The battery must neither be empty or full, nor reach empty or full capacity during the test.

testcase.purpose: Check if the BatteryManager.charging attribute must be set to true when the battery is full

description.pre_condition: 1. The device is plugged in to the charger before this test is run. 2. The battery is full.

testcase.purpose: Check if the BatteryManager.chargingTime attribute must be set to 0 when the battery is full

description.pre_condition: 1. The device is plugged in to the charger before this test is run. 2. The battery is full.

testcase.purpose: Check if the BatteryManager.dischargingTime attribute must be set to the value positive Infinity when the battery is full

description.pre_condition: 1. The device is plugged in to the charger before this test is run. 2. The battery is full.

testcase.purpose: Check if the BatteryManager.level attribute must be set to the value 1.0 when the battery is full

description.pre_condition: 1. The device is plugged in to the charger before this test is run. 2. The battery is full.
